title: Site-13 Incident Arc: SCP-1730 Fanart
content:

**Addendum 1730.10**: Extraction Mission Debriefing Report 
[[collapsible]]
[[div class="blockquote" style="border-radius: 10px; margin: 10px"]]
**Mission Debrief Interview**
**Date:** ██/██/████
**Interviewee:** Cpt. Ephram Ross, Mobile Task Force Apollo-3 “Game Wardens” Team Lead
**Interviewer:** Dr. Peter Vincent
**Mission Debrief:** SCP-1730 Extraction
**Subject:** SCP-1730
-----

[BEGIN LOG]

**Dr. Vincent:** So what exactly happened at the end of the extraction mission?

**AP-3 Ross:** There was an incident.

**Dr. Vincent:** Can you elaborate?

**AP-3 Ross:** ...

[END LOG]

**Closing Statement:** The image below was acquired after processing Video log.

[[/div]]
[[/collapsible]]

##transparent|.##
##transparent|.##

I'm relatively new to the SCP universe and [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-1730 SCP-1730] was the longest entry I read so far, but it was definetely one of the most enjoyable! Thought about drawing this since it kept flashbanging my mind while reading the end of the rescue mission audio log.
author: Tsukarame
